name: A Father's Office Burger for Father's Day
description: Note: A Hamburger Today contributor Brad Japhe wanted to share his celebratory Father's Day burger recipe, a modified version of the burger from Father's Office in California [review on AHT]. Here's his description of the burger with photos in case...
recipeIngredient: 1 whole onion, chopped into small pieces
1 part blue to three parts Gruyère cheese
